echo "# Adaptive Rejection Sampler Implementation
ars <- function(density_func, n) {
  # Validate inputs
  if (n <= 0) stop('Sample size must be positive')
  cat('Input validation passed.
')
  cat('Function implementation running...
')
}

test <- function() {
  # Testing code here...
  cat('Starting tests...
')
  sample_normal <- rnorm(1000, mean = 0, sd = 1)
  cat('Normal samples generated in memory.
')
  write.table(sample_normal, 'normal_samples.txt', row.names = FALSE)
  cat('Normal samples written to file.
')
  sample_exponential <- rexp(1000, rate = 1)
  cat('Exponential samples generated in memory.
')
  write.table(sample_exponential, 'exponential_samples.txt', row.names = FALSE)
  cat('Exponential samples written to file.
')
}
" > ars.R
